anathema: Reveal your actual identity, share power with the weak
edict: Learn arcane secrets, take from others what you cannot make yourself, rule from the shadows

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Lorthact (The Unraveler)](/Deities.aspx?ID=670)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 15

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Learn arcane secrets, take from others what you cannot make yourself, rule from the shadows

**Anathema** Reveal your actual identity, share power with the weak

**Area of Concern**
Exiles, scholars, theories

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Force Barrage](/Spells.aspx?ID=1536)

- **3rd**
[Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=1677)

- **6th**
[Never Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1614)

</column>
